title: Privacy Policy
description: We value your privacy. This privacy policy explains how AI Image Splitter handles your information.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to AI Image Splitter ("we," "our," or "the service"). We are committed to protecting your privacy, and this privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use our website and services.

dataCollection.title: Information We Collect
dataCollection.overview: Our core principle is to maximize protection of your privacy. Here's how we handle data:

imageProcessing.title: Image Processing
imageProcessing.content: All images you upload to AI Image Splitter are processed locally in your browser. This means your images are never uploaded to our servers or leave your device. We cannot access, view, or store any of your image content.

technicalData.title: Technical Data
technicalData.content: To improve our service, we may collect anonymous technical information, including:
items: Basic error logs (containing no personal information)

noPersonalData.title: No Personal Information Collection
noPersonalData.content: We do not collect, store, or process any personally identifiable information, including but not limited to:
items: Names, email addresses, or contact information
Account information (since we require no registration)
Payment information (since our service is completely free)
Your uploaded images or file content

dataUsage.title: How We Use Information
dataUsage.content: The limited anonymous data we collect is used solely for:
items: Improving website performance and user experience
Understanding usage patterns to optimize features

dataSharing.title: Information Sharing
dataSharing.content: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your information to third parties. The only third-party service we use is:

googleAnalytics.title: Google Analytics
googleAnalytics.content: We use Google Analytics to understand website usage. This service collects anonymous usage data to help us improve the website. You can opt out by installing the Google Analytics opt-out browser add-on.

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement the following measures to protect your privacy:
measures: All image processing occurs client-side, never uploaded to servers
Website uses HTTPS encryption to protect data transmission
We do not store any user-generated content
Regular security updates to prevent potential threats

cookies.title: Cookies and Local Storage
cookies.content: We use minimal cookies and local storage to:
cookies.note: You can manage or disable cookies through your browser settings, but this may affect the normal operation of certain features.

userRights.title: Your Rights
userRights.content: Since we don't collect personal information, there is no personal data to delete or modify. However, you always have the following rights:
rights: Stop using our service at any time

minorProtection.title: Children's Privacy Protection
minorProtection.content: Our service is not directed to children under 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If you are a parent or guardian and discover that your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us, and we will immediately delete such information.

internationalUsers.title: International Users
internationalUsers.content: AI Image Splitter is available to users worldwide. Due to our client-side processing approach, your data does not cross borders. We comply with applicable data protection laws, including GDPR, CCPA, and others.

policyChanges.title: Privacy Policy Changes
policyChanges.content: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page and the "Last Updated" date will be updated. We encourage you to review this policy periodically to stay informed of any changes.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions or concerns about this privacy policy, please contact us:
contact.response: We will respond to your inquiry within 48 hours of receipt.
